title: A Mommy for Christmas
description: Melanie Cartwright is a single, tired, thirty two year old music teacher with one ill-tempered niece. Jackson Gilroy is a widower with a smart mouthed little girl that seems to get away with everything as of late. Until they meet one night over a shared glance from their prospective windows, Jackson didn’t think he’d ever feel anything again. But with Christmas, anything's possible!
author: Danielle Lee Zwissler
